title: Atma shakti taruvAi
sahitya:
Atma shakti taruvAi ennappanE Atma shakti taruvAi un paNi sheyya


anupallavi

  pUtta pU pOlap-puravuDalAnadu puNNiyA unadu eNNam sheigai pera


caraNam    arpa dEhattirkkukk-arpamUTTiyumen azhukku bhANDam ebrum amuda kalashamAmO
cirparA shakti tiruviLaiyADa en cittattil unnaruL vaittu vaLarttu nidam
